input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Timex"
Reference Product Name: "Expedition Scout"
Reference Product Description:
The Expedition Titanium is ready to go the distance, living up to the Timex legacy of fully equipping you for your adventures ahead while embodying the kind of tradition you can wear every day. Its key feature is its shock-resistant 38mm case rendered in true titanium, offering incredible durability while ensuring a comfortably lightweight feel on the wrist. Reinforcing its 200m water resistance are a screw-down crown and screw-on caseback that effectively keep water out, while the light gray dial features a date window at 3 o'clock and luminescent hands and hour markers for enhanced visibility in lowlight conditions. Clean and modern, itâ€™s powered by a reliable quartz movement and features a sapphire crystal for optimal clarity, a sturdy crown protector, and a smooth grain Italian leather strap ethically sourced from and gold-rated by the Leather Working Group (LWG) and complete with contrast side stitches.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Casio Men's Pro Trek Solar Atomic Triple-Sensor Watch'
  - Name='Vintage Bulova Men's Military Wristwatch 17 Jewels Excellent Condition'
  - Name='Casio PRO TREK Solar Radio Men's Watch PRW-70'
  - Name='Bulova 50s Usa Military Watch Stainless Steel'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Flynn Sport Multifunction Leather Watch'
  - Name='Bulova Military Vintage Stainless Steel Automatic Men's Watch 98A307 - MXW16 - New Men | Color: Green | Size: s'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Machine Chronograph Quartz Watch'
  - Name='Vintage "bulova" Us Army Wristwatch'
  - Name='Skagen Men's Riis Minimalist Watch with Leather Band'
  - Name='Women's Skagen Hagen Watch SKW2582'
  - Name='Men's Skagen Ancher Watch SKW6290'
  - Name='Skagen Men's Grenen Solar Halo Watch'
  - Name='Casio Men's Watch'
  - Name='Bulova Accessories | Caravelle Men's Quartz Field Watch By Bulova Black Nato Strap Black Case 41mm | Color: Black/White | Size: Os | Pm-55086389's'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Fenmore Multifunction Black-Tone'
  - Name='Men's BQ2666 Fossil Sullivan Watch'
  - Name='Casio Men's Classic Watch MTP3050D-2AV'
  - Name='Casio Men's Heavy Duty Quartz Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Bulova Vintage US Military Watch Hand Wind Mil-w-3818a Ser. No. 08692 Works Well - Vintage & collectibles'
  - Name='Bulova Men's Stainless Steel Military Manual Wind Watch'
  - Name='Skagen Men's Signatur Three-Hand Stainless Steel Bracelet Watch'
  - Name='Citizen PROMASTER CB5039-11L Men's LAND Series Eco-Drive Radio Wave'
  - Name='Bulova A-11 Military Watch, 37mm'
  - Name='Vintage Bulova Usa Military Watch'
  - Name='Bulova Vintage 1940s Military Watch ORD DEP USA Of 02038 Hand Wound Works. - Vintage & collectibles'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio Men's Pro Trek Solar Atomic Triple-Sensor Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are rugged adventure-oriented watches with durability and features like shock resistance and multiple sensors, suitable for outdoor use, although Casio is solar and atomic powered unlike the quartz Timex.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vintage Bulova Men's Military Wristwatch 17 Jewels Excellent Condition
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a vintage mechanical military watch that shares field watch heritage and ruggedness but differs in movement type, era, and certain modern features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio PRO TREK Solar Radio Men's Watch PRW-70
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar rugged adventure/tactical outdoor watch with solar power and radio control, intended for similar outdoor functions though with different power mechanisms.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova 50s Usa Military Watch Stainless Steel
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A vintage military watch with a stainless steel case; shares military field style but lacks modern materials and features like titanium and modern water resistance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Flynn Sport Multifunction Leather Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Modern quartz multifunction leather watch offering similar casual usage and style but less focused on rugged outdoor durability, no titanium or strong water resistance highlighted.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Military Vintage Stainless Steel Automatic Men's Watch 98A307 - MXW16 - New Men | Color: Green | Size: s
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Military style wristwatch with automatic movement and steel case; shares field watch aesthetic but not titanium or modern shock resistant with sapphire crystal.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Machine Chronograph Quartz Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Quartz chronograph leather watch with casual/urban styling, less focused on outdoor ruggedness or titanium construction like the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vintage "bulova" Us Army Wristwatch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A vintage military mechanical wristwatch sharing field watch heritage but differing significantly in materials, movement, and modern features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Skagen Men's Riis Minimalist Watch with Leather Band
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Minimalist design watch with leather strap but not focused on ruggedness, durability, or outdoor adventure features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Women's Skagen Hagen Watch SKW2582
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's minimalist fashion watch with leather band, little relation to rugged or adventure watch design or feature set.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Skagen Ancher Watch SKW6290
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Minimalist stainless steel watch with leather band, more fashion-oriented than rugged outdoor focus of reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Skagen Men's Grenen Solar Halo Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Solar powered minimalist watch, some modern technology overlap but lacks rugged titanium and adventure features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio Men's Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic Casio watch without specific features detailed; Casio often makes rugged watches but without details relevancy is moderate at best.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Accessories | Caravelle Men's Quartz Field Watch By Bulova Black Nato Strap Black Case 41mm | Color: Black/White | Size: Os | Pm-55086389's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Quartz field watch with NATO strap shares field watch style, rugged utility but different materials and potentially less advanced shock resistance or titanium case.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Fenmore Multifunction Black-Tone
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Multifunction quartz watch with casual leather strap; suitable for everyday wear but less rugged and technically advanced than reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's BQ2666 Fossil Sullivan Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fashion-oriented quartz watch with leather strap, not designed for rugged outdoor use or titanium construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio Men's Classic Watch MTP3050D-2AV
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Basic classic quartz watch; lacks adventure or rugged features but shares general wristwatch category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio Men's Heavy Duty Quartz Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Heavy duty quartz watch with stainless steel case; similar focus on durability although steel rather than titanium and less detailed outdoor features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Vintage US Military Watch Hand Wind Mil-w-3818a Ser. No. 08692 Works Well - Vintage & collectibles
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Vintage manual wind military watch, similar style but older construction and lacks modern materials or features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Men's Stainless Steel Military Manual Wind Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Military manual wind watch in stainless steel; shares field watch heritage but lacks titanium and advanced modern features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Skagen Men's Signatur Three-Hand Stainless Steel Bracelet Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Simple stainless steel minimalist watch; more fashion-focused without rugged, adventure-specific features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen PROMASTER CB5039-11L Men's LAND Series Eco-Drive Radio Wave
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Rugged outdoor Land series watch with advanced features like radio wave timekeeping and solar power, very close in purpose and sophistication to the reference but differing in power source type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova A-11 Military Watch, 37mm
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic military style field watch compatible with reference watch size, shares rugged field styling but is vintage manual and stainless steel.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vintage Bulova Usa Military Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Vintage military mechanical field watch with similar style but lacks modern materials and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Vintage 1940s Military Watch ORD DEP USA Of 02038 Hand Wound Works. - Vintage & collectibles
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Old vintage mechanical military watch, shares field watch heritage but not the modern materials or functions.
